item.title: My newest sig
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:4, topic:135458”]All you did was search fire in google and added some render ontop then added a filter and text uglier than mine.
And looks like you used only one layer.
Its also against rules to double post, dont do it again.[/quote]

Werent you the genius who said I just follow whatever exe says,well looks like you just did hypocrite.

Also javais, Ihave never used gimp so no idea if it has filters and whatnot,but you should take those blocks out,make a small background and better render.

The grunge background is a okay bg to start with,good luck with the next one.Oh yes,new text :]

Read full topic

item.title: My newest sig
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:4, topic:135458”]All you did was search fire in google and added some render ontop then added a filter and text uglier than mine.
And looks like you used only one layer.
Its also against rules to double post, dont do it again.[/quote]

i made that background it wasnt fire its a grunge background. i followed a tut to do it. Sad just because exe thought it was fire other people have to copy what he says. I didnt use a filter (im using gimp and idk if you can even use filters). If you think your gfx is better than mine keep it to your self killer because i dont care. the block was because its something i know how to do and i decided to try again.

Read full topic

item.title: My newest sig

item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

All you did was search fire in google and added some render ontop then added a filter and text uglier than mine.
And looks like you used only one layer.
Its also against rules to double post, dont do it again.

item.title: My newest sig
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

It looks exactly like your other signature. Its too big, and the render is too small. It does not flow in anywhich way shape or form. Looks like you found a picture of fire, and dropped this render on it after adding all these little sq. Not to mention that horrible text up there in the corner. And you double posted hoping somebody would rate it.
1/10
Go read some tutorials on sites like Gamerenders and PlanetRenders

Read full topic
